TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IpcClientChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class IpcClientChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 IPC 通訊協定傳輸訊息的用戶端通道。

span.span: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the IPC protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會使用.net Framework 遠端處理基礎結構來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the.NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client calls a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 收到訊息之後，它是還原序列化，並處理。After the message is received, it is deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是由伺服器通道傳送，並由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 類別會在相同電腦上的應用程式定義域之間使用 Windows 處理序間通訊 (IPC) 系統來傳輸訊息。The class uses the Windows interprocess communication (IPC) system to transport messages between application domains on the same computer. 在相同電腦上的應用程式定義域之間的通訊，IPC 通道時，速度比 TCP 或 HTTP 通道。When communicating between application domains on the same computer, the IPC channel is much faster than the TCP or HTTP channels. 若要執行額外處理的訊息用戶端，您可以指定的實作透過其中所處理的所有訊息的介面會傳遞給物件。To perform additional processing of messages on the client side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the object will be passed. 根據預設，類別來序列化所有的訊息使用二進位格式器。By default, the class uses a binary formatter to serialize all messages. A物件具有相關聯的組態屬性可以設定在執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱文件建構函式。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/client.cs#20)] 上述程式碼會使用下列遠端物件。The preceding code uses the following remote object. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/counter.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/counter.cs#0)] 如需公開此物件從遠端伺服器的範例，請參閱。For an example of a server that exposes this object remotely, see .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態屬性這個建構函式所傳回的執行個體設定為其預設值。The configuration properties of the instance returned by this constructor are all set to their default values. 下表顯示每個組態屬性的預設值。The following table shows the default value for each configuration property. |組態屬性Configuration property|描述Description| |----------------------------|-----------------| |`name`|預設名稱是 「 ipc 用戶端 」。The default name is "ipc client". 每個通道必須具有唯一名稱。Each channel must have a unique name.| |`priority`|預設優先權為 1。The default priority is 1.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/client.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/client.cs#21)]

summary.span: 使用指定的組態屬性和接收，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CPP/client2.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CS/client2.cs#41)]

span.span: The name of the channel.

param.span: 通道要使用的 實作。

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和接收，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊一個以上的通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#42](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CPP/client2.cpp#42)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CS/client2.cs#42)]

.property instance string ChannelName
Public ReadOnly Property ChannelName As String
public: property System::String ^ ChannelName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.

value.span: 執行個體，包含通道的名稱。

span.span: A instance that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定頻道方法。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling the method. 預設名稱是 「 ipc 用戶端 」。The default name is "ipc client". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CS/client.cs#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int ChannelPriority { get; }
.property instance int32 ChannelPriority
Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that indicates the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序控制的順序中的競爭的用戶端連線到指定的端點。較高的優先順序通道連線之前較低優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 預設優先權為 1。允許使用負值的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CS/client.cs#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink CreateMessageSink (string url, object remoteChannelData, out string objectURI);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink CreateMessageSink(string url, object remoteChannelData, [out] string& objectURI) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateMessageSink (url As String, remoteChannelData As Object, ByRef objectURI As String) As IMessageSink

public: virtual System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::IMessageSink ^ CreateMessageSink(System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % objectURI);

param.name: url
param.span: 新接收傳遞訊息的目標 URL。

span.span: The URL to which the new sink delivers messages.
This parameter can be .

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 遠端主機的通道資料物件，新接收應該將訊息傳遞至遠端主機。

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.
This parameter can be .

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的通道訊息接收。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 可能是`url`或`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcClientChannel/CS/client.cs#22)]

span.span: The provided sink does not implement .
